subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Derek Jeter became the oldest Yankee to record four straight multihit games, Brian McCann homered twice, and Masahiro Tanaka, playing for the first time since July 8, threw 70 pitches.
snippet: Derek Jeter became the oldest Yankee to record four straight multihit games, Brian McCann homered twice, and Masahiro Tanaka, playing for the first time since July 8, threw 70 pitches.
